name: Oceanic Dreadnought

civilopediaText.text: The Oceanic Dreadnought, an unstoppable warship of the Republic Federation of New Oceania, is a titan of the seas. Designed for unmatched dominance, it can cripple fleets, devastate cities, and intercept airborne threats with precision. With its immense strength and tactical versatility, the Oceanic Dreadnought ensures no enemy escapes its grasp.

uniques: [-50]% Strength for enemy [Water] units in adjacent [all] tiles <when above [20] HP>
[2] extra interceptions may be made per turn

name: Ship of The High Tides

civilopediaText.text: The Ship of The High Tides, a resilient warship of the Federation of the Eastern Dominion, is as adaptable as the ocean itself. Its ability to flow with the tides makes it nearly unsinkable in harsh conditions. When part of a fleet, it transforms into a force of nature, unleashing a tidal wave of destruction upon its enemies.

uniques: [-10]% Strength for enemy [non-[Air]] units in adjacent [Ocean] tiles
[+10]% Strength bonus for [Ship of The High Tides] units within [2] tiles

name: Floating Fortress

civilopediaText.text: The Floating Fortress, the largest warblimp ever conceived by humanity, dominates both the skies and the battlefield. With the ability to decimate land, cities, and fleets alike, it stands as a symbol of aerial supremacy for the Republic Federation of New Oceania. Its unmatched versatility ensures destruction wherever it flies.

uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units

name: Elite Soldier

civilopediaText.text: Forged in the Union of Vorherrschaft's secret military programs, Elite Soldiers are the epitome of discipline, resilience, and lethality. Trained to endure the harshest conditions and execute orders without hesitation, they excel in combat and leave a trail of destruction and profit in their wake.

uniques: Heals [20] damage if it kills a unit
Earn [100]% of the damage done to [all] units as [Gold]

name: Conqueror of Lands

civilopediaText.text: The Conqueror of Lands embodies the relentless expansionist spirit of the Union of Vorherrschaft. Marching into enemy territory with unwavering resolve, these infantry units carve out new strongholds, reshaping the map and bringing victory closer with every step.

uniques: Founds a new city <when above [100] HP>

civilopediaText.text: O noble Knight, protector of the Ubuntu Union, your duty is to shield the weak, defend the lands, and uphold peace. With watchful eyes and unmatched valor, you stand as a beacon of hope in times of turmoil.

name: Pledged To Protect

civilopediaText.text: Though missionaries at heart, the Pledged To Protect will not hesitate to defend their people and homeland. Steadfast and resilient, their strength grows in familiar lands, embodying the Ubuntu Union's unwavering commitment to peace and protection.

uniques: [+50]% Strength decreasing with distance from the capital <when fighting in [Friendly] tiles>

name: I'm not there

civilopediaText.text: Masters of stealth and subterfuge, the Desert Union's 'I'm not there' units are ghostly figures on the battlefield. Unseen until it's too late, they slip through borders undetected, striking where the enemy least expects it.

uniques: May enter foreign tiles without open borders

name: Swiss Soldier

civilopediaText.text: The Swiss Soldier stands as a symbol of precision, readiness, and adaptability. Mobilized and armed at a moment's notice, they excel in both combat and construction, making them a cornerstone of the Confederation of Switzerland's defense and development.

uniques: Can build [all] improvements at a [200]% rate

name: AAGA

civilopediaText.text: The ANTI-AERIAL GUN ARTILLERY (AAGA) is a formidable stationary turret designed to dominate the skies. Capable of both intercepting enemy aircraft with unmatched precision and delivering devastating bombardments, it is an essential asset for the Confederation of Switzerland's defense.

uniques: [2] extra interceptions may be made per turn

name: Hypersonic Striker

civilopediaText.text: The Hypersonic Striker, a pinnacle of engineering and patriotism, soars through the skies with unmatched speed and power. A high-velocity, sound-breaking aircraft that strikes fear into any foe, it's as lethal as it is awe-inspiring, representing the cutting edge of military might in the United States of Tres.

uniques: [+1] extra interceptions may be made per turn
Can upgrade to [Hypersonic Striker (ABILITY)] <when above [100] HP>

civilopediaText.text: The Winter Tank, a relic of the Old Soviet era, is a sturdy and reliable machine built for harsh winter conditions. With its ability to traverse snow and tundra with ease, it remains a formidable force on the battlefield, embodying the enduring spirit of the New Order of USSR.

name: One

civilopediaText.text: The 'One' is a high-risk, high-reward aircraft of the Federation of Eastern Dominion, designed for both devastating air combat and suicidal strikes. With a kamikaze mentality, it sacrifices itself to destroy its enemies.

uniques: [+2] extra interceptions may be made per turn

name: Spider Devil Tank
uniqueTo: Sovereign States of The Northern Highlands

civilopediaText.text: The Spider Devil Tank, a nightmarish creation of the Sovereign States of Northern Highlands, strikes fear into all who encounter it. With its terrifying mobility, relentless firepower, and ability to traverse any terrain, it is an unstoppable force that leaves nothing but destruction in its wake.

The ANTI-AERIAL GUN ARTILLERY (AAGA) is a formidable stationary turret designed to dominate the skies. Capable of both intercepting enemy aircraft with unmatched precision and delivering devastating bombardments, it is an essential asset for the Confederation of Switzerland's defense.

name: Red Army Soldier

civilopediaText.text: Red Army Soldiers, the stalwart defenders of the New Order of USSR, march forward with unyielding determination. With cries of 'For the Motherland!' they fight with vigor in times of prosperity, but their strength wanes in darker days.

uniques: [-30]% Strength <when not in a Golden Age>

name: Soviet Worker

civilopediaText.text: The Soviet Worker, a tireless laborer of the New Order of USSR, is bound by duty and resilience. While they may grumble under the weight of their work, in times of prosperity, they find strength and speed in their toil, contributing to the machine of the state.

uniques: Can build [all] improvements at a [150]% rate

name: Coordinated Strikers

civilopediaText.text: Why settle for one when you can have three? The Coordinated Strikers embody the power of numbers, overwhelming enemies with synchronized strikes from the sky. A symbol of unmatched freedom and air superiority, they dominate the skies with sheer force and precision.

uniques: [+1] extra interceptions may be made per turn
Can upgrade to [Coordinated Strikers (ABILITY)] <when above [100] HP>

name: United Forces Soldier
uniqueTo: Sovereign States of The Northern Highlands

civilopediaText.text: The United Forces Soldier is a steadfast warrior, bound by the creed of unity and survival. In a world of chaos, they believe in the strength of togetherness, fighting side by side to ensure their survival and the prosperity of the Sovereign States of Northern Highlands.

uniques: [+30]% Strength bonus for [United Forces Soldier] units within [1] tiles

civilopediaText.text: The Desert Soldier, a hardened warrior of the unforgiving sands, knows the scent of fire and smoke all too well. In the harsh desert landscapes, they strike with deadly precision, bringing devastation to cities and enemies alike.

name: Coordinated Strikers (ABILITY)

civilopediaText.text: Why settle for one when you can have three? The Coordinated Strikers embody the power of numbers, overwhelming enemies with synchronized strikes from the sky. A symbol of unmatched freedom and air superiority, they dominate the skies with sheer force and precision.

uniques: Can upgrade to [Coordinated Strikers] <when above [50] HP> <within [0] tiles of a [City Center]>

name: Hypersonic Striker (ABILITY)

civilopediaText.text: The Hypersonic Striker, a pinnacle of engineering and patriotism, soars through the skies with unmatched speed and power. A high-velocity, sound-breaking aircraft that strikes fear into any foe, it's as lethal as it is awe-inspiring, representing the cutting edge of military might in the United States of Tres.

uniques: Can upgrade to [Hypersonic Striker] <when above [50] HP> <within [0] tiles of a [City Center]>

civilopediaText.text: The 'One' is a high-risk, high-reward aircraft of the Federation of Eastern Dominion, designed for both devastating air combat and suicidal strikes. With a kamikaze mentality, it sacrifices itself to destroy its enemies, and when upgraded, it becomes an even greater threat.
